txt.en: Framsburg can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should learn the history of the Rohirrim with Léothred.
Haldend's End
Framsburg can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should learn the history of the Rohirrim with Léothred.

'Ah, are you feeling well-rested? Good, then we can begin another day's delving into Rohirric history! Now we shall explore what I see as a crucial time for the Éothéod. Haldend remained their lord, but he had neither sons nor brothers to continue his line! Come, let us depart.'
Defeat giants in Misthallow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Framsburg can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should return to Framsburg.

Thane
'Various thanes began plotting to seize control upon Haldend's certain death, but no clear contender emerged.'
'It seemed the Éothéod might fragment into a band of bickering households!'
Théodwyne Sternbrow
Framsburg can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should talk to Léothred at Framsburg.
'After Haldend’s injury, his daughter stepped forward to care for him and speak for him as his mind deteriorated.'
'Father, do not worry. I will make you proud.'
Defeated giants in Misthallow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'When Haldend finally died, choking to death in his sleep, Théodwyne Sternbrow had effectively already become lord of the Éothéod.'
Talk to Léothred elsewhere at Framsburg
'It is my right to take my father's place as your ruler.'
Defeated trolls in Misthallow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Wargs in Misthallow ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Léothred at Framsburg
'Ah, are you feeling well-rested?'
'Haldend did have a daughter, however, and she proved the salvation of her people.'
'As you can see, these were uncertain times for my people.'
Framsburg can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should learn the history of the Rohirrim with Léothred.
Léothred, the Rohirric scholar, seeks to learn more of his people's history in Misthallow.
'As you can see, these were most uncertain times for my people. There was hope, however!'

'Haldend did have a daughter, however, and she proved the salvation of her people. Théodwyne Sternbrow was a formidable woman, a shield-maiden who towered over, and could easily best, many of the Éothéod's finest warriors. She slew several trolls, faced giants, and hunted Wargs in the wild.\n\n'Perhaps we should slay a few giants, trolls, and Wargs to better understand Théodwyne's might!'
Giants may be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should seek out and defeat giants to learn more about Théodwyne Sternbrow.
